text: "Another Saturday Night" is a 1963 song by Sam Cooke from his 11th and final studio album Ain't That Good News. It went to number 10 in the United States and number 23 in the United Kingdom. ==Cat Stevens version== In 1974, Cat Stevens recorded his version of Another Saturday Night and went to number 19 in the United Kingdom, number 6 in the United States, number 1 in Canada, number 15 in Australia and number 13 in South Africa. == References == Category:1963 songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Sam Cooke songs Category:Cat Stevens songs Category:Jimmy Buffett songs Category:Sam & Dave songs
title: Another Saturday Night
